title: Dependable
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>I have some stuff to do today, so I’ll take my leave.... See you tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh, what? We don’t even have a test coming up. What are you up to?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hm? I need to help out a bit at the shrine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>If that’s all it is, why don’t you just say so? There’s nothing I couldn’t help you with, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then.... Can I ask you for help, Nikocchi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess I don’t have a choice~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>We decided to reorganize our archive, so we need to rewrite our financial records and make them digital. Can you help me with that....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....That’s more work than I thought. But leave it to me! Nico will get it done in no time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Really!? You’re a lifesaver....! Thank you, Nikocchi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Treat me to some sweet sake after we’re done, alright~? Okay, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
